sqlMap.select: SELECT KPI_SET_ID, KPI_SET_NAME FROM KPI_SET_MKT_ANALYSIS ORDER BY KPI_SET_SEQ;
SELECT KPI_GROUP_ID, KPI_GROUP_NAME, CHART_STYLE_ID, CHART_DATA_CODE FROM KPI_GROUP_MKT_ANALYSIS ORDER BY KPI_GROUP_ORDER;

SELECT G.KPI_GROUP_ID, G.KPI_GROUP_NAME, G.CHART_DATA_CODE, G.DATA_SOURCE, C.XML_TEMPLATE, C.FLASH_FILE FROM KPI_GROUP_MKT_ANALYSIS G INNER JOIN CHART_STYLE C ON G.CHART_STYLE_ID = C.CHART_STYLE_ID WHERE G.KPI_SET_ID = #KPI_SET_ID# ORDER BY G.KPI_GROUP_ORDER;

SELECT V.KPI_ID, V.KPI_NAME, V.KPI_DESC, V.CHART_TYPE_ID, V.AXIS, V.UNIT_NAME, V.UNIT_MULTIPLE, V.UNIT_TYPE, V.PRECISIONS_FORMAT FROM V_KPI_DEFINE_MKT_ANALYSIS V INNER JOIN KPI_GROUP_AND_KPI_RELA R ON V.KPI_ID = R.KPI_ID WHERE R.KPI_GROUP_ID = #KPI_GROUP_ID# ORDER BY V.DISPLAY_ORDER

SELECT D.KPI_ID, V.DATA_DATE, V.BRANCH_ID, V.KPI_VALUE, V.KPI_RANK, V.KPI_GROUP_RANK, D.UNIT_NAME, D.UNIT_MULTIPLE, D.UNIT_TYPE, D.PRECISIONS_FORMAT FROM V_KPI_DEFINE_MKT_ANALYSIS D LEFT JOIN KPI_VALUE V ON V.KPI_ID = D.KPI_ID AND V.BRANCH_ID = #BRANCH_ID# AND V.DATA_DATE = #DATA_DATE# WHERE D.KPI_ID = #KPI_ID#

SELECT R.KPI_GROUP_ID, D.KPI_ID, D.KPI_NAME, D.AXIS, D.UNIT_NAME, D.UNIT_MULTIPLE, D.UNIT_TYPE, D.PRECISIONS_FORMAT, T.CHART_TYPE_CODE, V.KPI_VALUE, V.BRANCH_ID, V.DATA_DATE FROM KPI_GROUP_AND_KPI_RELA R INNER JOIN V_KPI_DEFINE_MKT_ANALYSIS D ON R.KPI_ID = D.KPI_ID INNER JOIN CHART_TYPE T ON T.CHART_TYPE_ID = D.CHART_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN KPI_VALUE V ON V.KPI_ID = D.KPI_ID AND V.BRANCH_ID IN ($BRANCH_ID$) AND V.DATA_DATE IN ($DATA_DATE$) WHERE R.KPI_GROUP_ID = #KPI_GROUP_ID# ORDER BY D.DISPLAY_ORDER, V.DATA_DATE;

SELECT R.KPI_GROUP_ID, D.KPI_ID, D.KPI_NAME, D.AXIS, D.UNIT_NAME, D.UNIT_MULTIPLE, D.UNIT_TYPE, D.PRECISIONS_FORMAT, T.CHART_TYPE_CODE, V.KPI_VALUE, V.BRANCH_ID FROM KPI_GROUP_AND_KPI_RELA R INNER JOIN V_KPI_DEFINE_MKT_ANALYSIS D ON R.KPI_ID = D.KPI_ID INNER JOIN CHART_TYPE T ON T.CHART_TYPE_ID = D.CHART_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN KPI_VALUE V ON V.KPI_ID = D.KPI_ID LEFT JOIN BRANCH B ON V.BRANCH_ID = B.BRANCH_ID WHERE R.KPI_GROUP_ID = #KPI_GROUP_ID# AND V.BRANCH_ID IN ($BRANCH_ID$) AND V.DATA_DATE = #DATA_DATE# ORDER BY D.DISPLAY_ORDER, B.BRANCH_SEQ, V.DATA_DATE;

SELECT A.BRANCH_ID, A.STRM_1_RT, A.STRM_10_RT, A.STRM_30_RT, A.STRM_50_RT, A.STRM_100_RT, A.STRM_150_RT, A.STRM_200_RT, A.STRM_500_RT, A.STRM_1000_RT, A.STRM_1000_UP_RT FROM RP_GPRS_STRM_LVL_MON A WHERE STATIS_MON = #DATA_DATE# AND BRANCH_ID IN ($BRANCH_ID$);

SELECT D.KPI_ID, D.KPI_NAME, D.AXIS, D.UNIT_NAME, D.UNIT_MULTIPLE, D.UNIT_TYPE, D.PRECISIONS_FORMAT, T.CHART_TYPE_CODE, V.KPI_VALUE, V.BRANCH_ID, V.DATA_DATE FROM KPI_VALUE V INNER JOIN V_KPI_DEFINE_MKT_ANALYSIS D ON V.KPI_ID = D.KPI_ID INNER JOIN CHART_TYPE T ON T.CHART_TYPE_ID = D.CHART_TYPE_ID WHERE V.KPI_ID = #KPI_ID# AND V.BRANCH_ID = #BRANCH_ID# AND V.DATA_DATE BETWEEN '201402' AND #DATA_DATE# ORDER BY DATA_DATE
